title: Basic Usage
content: The data attribute is used to configure menu data. If the data attribute is not configured, the background service is read by default. For example, Jalor 6 reads the leftMenuNode data of the services/jalor/web/support/workspace/current service.
findIntroStr: NavMenu navigation menu, which is used to define the navigation menu on the top of a page.

title: Data Source
findIntroStr: NavMenu navigation menu, which is used to define the navigation menu on the top of a page.

title: Display Policy
content:
When the level-1 menu cannot be completely displayed in the current menu container, you can configure the display policy through the overflow attribute. There are four options: auto, retract, fixed, and hidden. The default value is auto.

overflow Option Description

auto: The More menu is displayed on the right of the menu bar. When you hover over the menu, the remaining menus are displayed. fixed: The Sandwich Collapse/Expand icon is displayed on the left of the menu bar. When you hover over the icon, all menus are displayed. retract: No menu is displayed on the menu bar. Only the Sandwich Collapse/Expand icon is displayed. When you hover over the icon, all menus are displayed. hidden: hides the remaining menus.
findIntroStr: NavMenu navigation menu, which is used to define the navigation menu on the top of a page.

title: Toolbar slot
content: Provides a toolbar slot for customizing the Toolbar.
findIntroStr: NavMenu navigation menu, which is used to define the navigation menu on the top of a page.

title: Logo slot
content: Provides a logo slot for customizing the logo.
findIntroStr: NavMenu navigation menu, which is used to define the navigation menu on the top of a page.

title: Menu redirection processing
content: Provides the before-skip hook function for processing logic before a menu is clicked. If false is returned, the menu cannot be redirected.
findIntroStr: NavMenu navigation menu, which is used to define the navigation menu on the top of a page.

title: Menu redirection processing when the default service of the component is used
content: If the default service /workspace/current of the component is used to obtain the menu data response.data.leftMenuNode.children, when before-skip is used: The prevent attribute needs to be configured to prevent the default redirection behavior. The default value of the prevent attribute is false.
findIntroStr: NavMenu navigation menu, which is used to define the navigation menu on the top of a page.

title: Custom Service
content: You can use the fetch-menu-data to customize the menu service. If the fields in the data are not the default title and url, You can use fields to map the fields in the data.
